main event: A witness reported seeing a white light in the sky over Durenville, Texas, which changed color and appeared to travel at high speeds.
interesting points: The object was observed at a distance of 3-5 miles and seemed to hover for several minutes., The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes., The witness described the object as initially appearing like a star but larger and brighter., The object changed to yellow during the sighting and displayed sudden changes in direction., The witness expressed doubt about the physical nature of the object, suggesting it could be a figment of the imagination.
sighted object: a white light that changed color in the sky
witness description: a local farmer and a local businessman who were observing the object together
